price: 17. Waxaa loo soo kulmiyey Sulaymaan askartiisii oo jin, dad iyo shimbiraba leh iyagoo loo abuubalay kooxo ahaan.
arabic: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ جُنُودُهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلطَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waḥushira lisulaymāna junūduhu mina al-jini wal-insi wal-ṭayri fahum yūzaʿūna
